parameter.name: accountId
parameter.description: The accountId of the account that the user is using, returned in the Login response.

parameter.name: envelopeId
parameter.description: The envelopeId Guid of the envelope being accessed.

parameter.name: includeTabs
parameter.description: When true the tab information associated with the recipient is included in the response.

parameter.name: includeExtended
parameter.description: When true the extended properties are included in the response.

parameter.name: includeAnchorTabLocations
parameter.description: When true and include_tabs=true, all tabs with anchor tab properties are included in the response.
